alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; Koochiching; North Itasca; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued May 13 at 2:45PM CDT until May 15 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...DRY CONDITIONS TOMORROW WITH POTENTIALLY CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER FOR MONDAY... .Clearing skies will lead to very dry conditions on Sunday. Minimum relative humidities may drop into the teens across northern MN. Dry conditions will persist into Monday with increased winds. Westerly winds may gust up to 30 mph at times. A red flag warning may be needed. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING FOR WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR NORTH CENTRAL MN... The National Weather Service in Duluth has issued a Fire Weather Watch for winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from Monday morning through Monday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...In Minnesota, Koochiching, North St. Louis, Northern Cook and Lake, North Itasca and Central St. Louis. * WINDS...West 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 17 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the lower 70s. * IMPACTS...
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; Koochiching; North Itasca; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake
